package.name: DarkCircuitry_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
A reasonably simple dark message style, currently with Normal (left icons) Alternating Icons (left out, right in) and Time on Consecutive (for both normal and alternating) modes.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=446
